5.name: Groom
5.body: Each time you complete a red guest's order, get 2 krones.

6.name: Stableman
6.body: Each time you complete a blue guest's order, advance 1 space on the Emperor track.

7.name: Masseuse
7.body: Each time you complete a yellow guest's order, get 1 krone.

8.name: Tour Guide
8.body: Each time you complete a green guest's order, score 2 VP.

9.name: Butler
9.details: Does not grant a free action; it merely removes the cost.

10.name: Chauffeur
10.details: Does not grant a free action; it merely removes the cost.

11.name: Florist
11.details: Does not grant a free action; it merely removes the cost.

12.name: Executive Housekeeper
12.body: Each time you take a die showing 3 or 4, immediately score 2 VP.

13.name: Restaurant Manager
13.body: Each time you take a die showing 1 or 2, add 1 to the strength of that action.
13.details: You can still boost further by paying 1 krone.

14.name: Decorator
14.body: Each time you take a die showing 1 or 2, you may also prepare one room (any color) by paying the normal cost, before or after the main action.
14.details: No additional actions between the main action and room preparation.

15.name: Bootblack
15.body: Die 4: for each die on the space, get 1 krone AND advance 1 Emperor space — no split required.
15.details: Boosting also gains 1 krone and 1 Emperor space for effectively free.

16.name: Laundress
16.body: Each time you take a die showing 4, immediately score 4 VP.

17.name: Kitchen Hand
17.body: Die 6 no longer costs 1 krone; additionally, add 1 to its strength.
17.details: You can still boost further by paying 1 krone.

18.name: Checker
18.body: Each time you take a die showing 5, add 2 to the strength (extra discount of 2 krones).

19.name: Interior Architect
19.body: Each time you take a die showing 3, immediately score 5 VP.

20.name: Detective
20.body: Each time you take a die showing 5, you may also advance 2 spaces on the Emperor track, before or after the main action.
20.details: No additional actions between the main action and advancing.

21.name: Chef
21.body: Gain 1 strudel, 1 cake, 1 wine, and 1 coffee.

22.name: Staff Manager
22.body: Each time you take a die showing 3, you may also play a staff card from hand at its normal cost, before or after the main action.
22.details: No additional actions between the main action and playing the staff card.

23.name: Custodian
23.body: Each time you occupy a room (by any means), get 1 krone.

24.name: Chief Waiter
24.body: Moving items from your kitchen to guests costs nothing.

25.name: Delivery Boy
25.body: Taking guests from the queue costs nothing.
25.details: Does not provide a guest; it merely removes the cost.

26.name: Conference Manager
26.body: You may pay 1 krone to ignore the penalty during an Emperor scoring.

27.name: Booking Manager
27.body: Score an additional 3 VP for each occupied red room in your hotel.

28.name: Concierge
28.body: Score an additional 3 VP for each occupied blue room in your hotel.

29.name: Secretary
29.body: Select an opponent's final scoring staff card in play and apply its effect to your hotel.
29.details: Cannot copy your own staff. If no opponents have final scoring staff in play, scores nothing.

30.name: Reception Clerk
30.body: Score an additional 3 VP for each occupied yellow room in your hotel.

31.name: Chambermaid
31.body: Score an additional 1 VP for each occupied room in your hotel (any color).

32.name: Assistant Manager
32.body: Score 2 VP for each staff card you played (of any type), including this one.

33.name: Male Floor Housekeeper
33.body: Each time you complete a guest's order requiring 4 or more items, score 4 VP.

34.name: Receptionist
34.body: Score 1 VP for each room tile in your hotel, whether vacant or occupied.

35.name: Page Boy
35.body: Occupy up to 2 rooms (any color) by turning them to the occupied side.

37.name: Room Service
37.body: Score 2 VP for each fully occupied group of rooms in your hotel (any color).

38.name: Porter
38.body: Fill one guest's order by taking the required items from the supply.

40.name: Marketing Director
40.body: Score 5 VP for each objective card that has your marker on it.

41.name: Operator
41.body: Score VP equal to double your position on the Emperor track (after the final scoring retreat).
41.details: You retreat 7 spaces after the last Emperor scoring; you will usually score at most 12 VP, but can score more.

42.name: Gardener
42.body: Each time you receive an Emperor scoring reward, score 5 additional VP.

45.name: Pool Attendant
45.body: Advance 3 spaces on the Emperor track.

46.name: Female Floor Housekeeper
46.body: Score 5 VP for each floor in your hotel that has all of its rooms occupied.

47.name: Liftboy
47.body: Score 5 VP for each column in your hotel that has all of its rooms occupied.

48.name: Hotel Manager
48.body: Score 4 VP for each set of one occupied red, one occupied blue, and one occupied yellow room (i.e., 4 VP × your least-represented occupied color count).
